name: St. Adalbert of Prague

locations.description: Bishop of Prague, missionary and martyr

summary: Adalbert of Prague was a bishop, missionary, and martyr. He was Bishop of Prague but left his see due to conflicts with the nobility. He became a missionary to the Prussians and was martyred while preaching to them. He is one of the patron saints of Poland, the Czech Republic, and Prussia. His missionary work helped spread Christianity in Eastern Europe.
